questions.text: In the standard Sprunki Incredibox mod, which accessory typically triggers the 'Horror' mode transformation?
questions.explanation: Placing the Black Hat on the central character (Wenda) shifts the game into its dark/horror state.

questions.text: Which platform was the Sprunki mod originally created on?
questions.explanation: Sprunki gained fame as a project on the MIT Scratch platform before expanding.

questions.text: What is the name of the studio that created the original Incredibox game?
questions.explanation: The French studio 'So Far So Good' released the original Incredibox in 2009.

questions.text: In the Sprunki lore, what visual change indicates a character has been corrupted?

options.C: Bleeding eyes or dark void faces

questions.explanation: Horror mode features gore, bleeding eyes, and dark, distorted features.

questions.text: How many main character slots are available to mix in a standard Incredibox version?
questions.explanation: Most versions features 7 distinctive characters/slots to build the mix.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a standard sound category in the game?
questions.explanation: Standard categories are Beats, Effects, Melodies, and Voices. Explosions are not a category.

questions.text: What is the primary color of the 'Sunny' (Oren) character in their default state?
questions.explanation: Oren is associated with the color Orange.

questions.text: The Sprunki mod became a viral sensation primarily on which social media platform?
questions.explanation: Like many modern mods, it gained massive traction via TikTok trends and edits.

questions.text: In the horror mode, the music style shifts from upbeat rhythms to what?
questions.explanation: The audio becomes distorted, glitchy, and unsettling to match the visuals.

questions.text: Which year represents the release of the original Incredibox (V1)?
questions.explanation: The first version was released as a Flash game in 2009.
